task: How to Treat a Ruptured Ovarian Cyst
step: Go to your doctor or the emergency room.

task: How to Know if You Have a Baker's Cyst
step: Understand that some health conditions can lead to the create of baker’s cysts.
Know that some knee injuries can increase your chances of developing these cysts.
Be aware that previous surgeries can predispose you to getting these cysts.
